Package Controllers

Class ErrorChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controllers.ErrorChecker
  • public class ErrorChecker
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is utilized to check for errors in different parts of the program

    • Method Detail

      • validateLogin

        public static boolean validateLogin​(java.lang.String username,
                                    java.lang.String password)
        This method detects if the username and password combo is valid and returns either true or false.
        Parameters:
        username - Username supplied by user
        password - Password supplied by user
        Returns:
        Returns true or false for valid login. True being it is a valid login, false if not

      • validateAddCustomerTextFields

        public static boolean validateAddCustomerTextFields​(java.util.ArrayList<javafx.scene.control.TextField> textFieldArrayList)
        This method validates the text fields in the add customer view for any errors
        Parameters:
        textFieldArrayList - Array list containing all text fields present on screen
        Returns:
        Boolean value indicating if a text field is empty or not

      • validateAppointmentFields

        public static int validateAppointmentFields​(java.util.ArrayList<javafx.scene.control.TextField> textFields,
                                            java.util.ArrayList<javafx.scene.control.TextField> idTextFieldsOnly,
                                            javafx.scene.control.ComboBox contactInfo,
                                            java.util.ArrayList<javafx.scene.control.ComboBox> dateBoxes,
                                            java.util.ArrayList<javafx.scene.control.ComboBox> startTimeBoxes,
                                            java.util.ArrayList<javafx.scene.control.ComboBox> endTimeBoxes)
        This method checks all fields on the add customer for any errors, will return -1 if no errors detected
        Parameters:
        textFields - Array list containing all text fields present on the screen
        contactInfo - Combo box that is passed that contains contact information present on the screen
        dateBoxes - Array list of the date boxes that contains date information on the screen
        startTimeBoxes - Array list of the start time boxes that contains starting time information on the screen
        endTimeBoxes - Array list of the end time boxes that contains ending time information on the screen
        Returns:
        Boolean returned whether or not an error is detected. True means a detected error was found, false means no error detected

      • customerIsSelected

        public static int customerIsSelected​(Customer customer)
        This method detects if a customer is selected to be deleted. If it is a null customer it will return an error number
        Parameters:
        customer - Customer object that is passed to detect if a customer was selected on main screen
        Returns:
        Returns an integer to be given to the show alerts class if no customer is selected

      • appointmentIsSelected

        public static int appointmentIsSelected​(Appointment appointment)
        This method detects if an appointment is selected to be deleted. If it is a null appointment it will return an error number
        Parameters:
        appointment - Appointment object that is passed to detect if an appointment was selected on the main screen
        Returns:
        Returns an integer to be given to the show alert class if no appointment is selected

      • customerNameTextBoxEditEvent

        public static int customerNameTextBoxEditEvent​(java.lang.String newName)
        This method detects if an customer name text field in the main screen is empty/null
        Parameters:
        newName - New name the customer has been given
        Returns:
        Returns an error number that dictates if an error is shown or not

      • customerAddressTextBoxEditEvent

        public static int customerAddressTextBoxEditEvent​(java.lang.String newAddress)
        This method detects if the customer address text field in the screen is empty/null
        Parameters:
        newAddress - New address that has been supplied by user
        Returns:
        Returns an error number that dictates if an error is shown or not

        public static int divisionIdTextBoxEvent​(int newDivisionId)
        This method detects if the division id supplied is valid based on what is already in the database
        Parameters:
        newDivisionId - New division id supplied by the user
        Returns:
        Returns an error number that dictates whether an error is shown or not
